_comments.ui.showThemeSelector: Show/hide the theme selector dropdown in the header
_comments.ui.showFontToggle: Show/hide the font override toggle in the header
_comments.ui.showThemeToggle: Show/hide the dark/light mode toggle in the header
_comments.defaults.theme: Force a specific theme (e.g., 'cosmic-night', 'elegant-luxury'). Set to null to use user preference/localStorage
_comments.defaults.font: Force a specific font (e.g., 'inter', 'poppins'). Set to null to use theme default or user preference
_comments.defaults.darkMode: Force dark/light mode (true=dark, false=light, null=system/user preference)
